This is kind of stupid.[/bq]
There are more types of colors and you can modify how many pixels you want.
I guess you just put the image and render it with the default one. 
Look, I made this one:

!http://s15.postimg.org/romxz1osb/6816927953_af5edce5bc.jpg!

And turned it in:

!http://s3.postimg.org/9qi7n2kkz/crazybus.png!

...Oh did I said that you can turn gif too?
